original_title: 女闘牌伝　王牌に愛された千鳥積み
overview: An erotic drama starring Ai Kishi, a popular sexy actress who is sought after in magazine gravure. Chidori, who worked at the Sparrow Villa but did not know mahjong, did not touch the tiles and worked as a chore.
tagline: Staggered Pilgrimage Loved by Wang Tiles
title: Female Fighting Tiles
